sentence.Network_en: In an hour long philippic , the legislator denounced the lobbyist opposing his bill.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: via Latin from Greek philippikos, the name given to Demosthenes' speeches against Philip II of Macedon, also to those of Cicero against Mark Antony
